label: PaymentTradeSettlement
comment: The information that enables the reconciliation of a payment with the item(s) that the payment is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.

datatypeProperties.comment: The description, expressed as text, of additional information supplied to enable the matching of an entry with the items that the payment is intended to settle.
The code specifying the currency for this payment trade settlement.

objectProperties.comment: The tax applicable to this payment trade settlement.
The payee party for this payment trade settlement.
The payer party for this payment trade settlement.
The currency exchange applicable to this payment trade settlement.
The payment means specified for this payment trade settlement.
The monetary summation totals specified for this payment trade settlement.

referencedBy.comment: A trade settlement payment specified for this trade settlement payment.
